General.Name: Tederic Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Tederic Machinery Co., LTD manufactures and sells injection molding solutions in China and internationally. The company offers toggle system, two-platen, all electric, and electric injection molding machines; opposite injection molding machines with horizontal rotary turntable; and multi-component injection molding machines with vertical rotary turntable. Its products have applications in automotive parts, packaging, communication electronics, medical, logistics and environmental, urban construction, home appliances, daily necessities, and other industries. Tederic Machinery Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 245, North Wenze Road, Hangzhou, China, 311224
